attributes.action: Stop the media, bbc, mirror sun and tory papers, ripping into the labour party
attributes.additional_details: since the mention of chilcot report and brexit, the media have ignored the labour party jeremy corbyn and its members.  When they have mentioned the afore stated they have foul mouthed, this must stop, the media must not control politics from now on and we demand parliament look at this as the wishes of the voters
attributes.background: “Media are going to go after Corbyn BIG TIME tomorrow. There are some huge forces at work. Blair and progress behind this. HAS TO BE about Chilcot. They are determined to see him gone “
